name: R I D E
description:
How long have you been riding this line? It's hard to remember...

___________________________________________________________________________

R I D E  is a turn-based infinite runner game featuring:

  • Endless open road
  • Realistic wasteland biome
  • Simulated day/night cycle
  • Original music and art

___________________________________________________________________________

Created using:

  • Bitsy game maker
  • Bitsy Color custom editor and Bitsy Savior tool
  • Directional Avatar, Transparent Sprites, and BitsyMuse hacks
  • PO-14, PO-28, and PO-32 Pocket Operators
